beer.name: Old Kuncklehead
beer.description: A brewery tradition since 1989, BridgePort Old Knucklehead is a classic barley wine, brewed with double the amounts of malts and hops to create a beer that is audacious, malty, complex and full of character. The sweetness and richness of this beer make it an excellent partner for a variety of desserts or as an after-dinner libation.
